accept_invite_text: Hi {{email}}, click accept to become part of organization {{organization}}.
authentication.text: Manage your authentication methods and preferences.
configure_menu.text: Archive your menu items or drag to change order. Changes are saved automatically.
confirm.delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account with {{email}} email?
confirm.delete_resource: Are you sure you want to delete {{resource}} {{name}} ?
confirm.delete_resources: Are you sure you want to delete these {{resources}}?
confirm.remove_members: Are you sure you want to delete membership of {{emails}} for this {{entity}}?
contact_us.text: We will get back to you as soon as possible!
create_organization.text: Please create an organization to get started.
default_language.text: The language that will be given to new members.
delete_account.text: Permanently delete your {{appName}} account. Please note that this action is irreversible.
delete_resource_notice.text: As an admin you can permanently delete the {{resource}} {{name}}. All members will loose access to this {{resource}} and its data. Please note that this action is irreversible.
edit_attachment.text: Double-click on a cell in the 'Name' column to edit an attachment name.
email_domains.text: Enforce members to have an organizational email domain, ie {{domain}}.
error.bad_request_action: Bad request: Server could not process the request
error.body_too_large.text: The request body is too large. Please try again later or contact support.
error.contact_mistake: If you believe this to be a mistake, please contact support.
error.expired.token: Token has expired. Please request a new one.
error.forbidden.text: Not allowed to perform this action.
error.forbidden_action: Forbidden: Not allowed to perform this action
error.forbidden_strategy.text: Please use another authentication method or contact support.
error.image_upload_failed: Image upload failed. Try again later
error.invalid_credentials.text: The credentials used during the authentication are invalid.
error.invalid_request.text: Request is invalid. Please contact support if the problem persists.
error.invalid_role.text: Your permissions are insufficient or invalid.
error.invalid_session.text: Your session has expired or is invalid. Please sign in again.
error.invalid_state.text: Could not complete the authentication process.
error.invalid_token_or_expired: You provided an invalid or expired token. Try again or contact support
error.load_more_failed: Could not load more data. Try reloading or come back later.
error.network_error: Network error. Please check your network connection or try again later.
error.newsletter_request_error: You can`t use the same email for both the newsletter and the waitlist. Please use a different email to get info about our app
error.newsletter_sign_up: Unable to submit your email address. Please try again later.
error.no_email_found.text: No email address could be found on the resource.
error.no_selected_rows: Export cannot proceed as no rows are selected.
error.no_session.text: Please reload and sign in again to continue.
error.not_found.text: This resource does not exist or has been deleted.
error.not_found.token: Token is invalid. Please request a new one.
error.oauth_failed.text: OAuth authentication failed. Please try again or use another method.
error.oauth_mismatch.text: The account you tried to connect is already linked to a different user. Please use another authentication method. If you happen to have two user accounts, please contact support.
error.organization_missing.text: Organization slug or id is required to perform this action.
error.passkey_add_failed: Registering passkey failed. Try again later.
error.passkey_failed.text: Passkey verification failed. Please try again or use another method.
error.passkey_remove_failed: Removing passkey failed. Try again later.
error.reported_try_later: An error has been reported. Please try again later.
error.reported_try_or_contact: An error has been reported. Please try again later and contact support if the problem persists.
error.request_email_is_user: This email is already linked to an account. Please use a different one!
error.request_exists: Already received your request. Please use contact form for urgent matters.
error.reset_password_email: The reset email could not be sent. Please try again.
error.resource_forbidden.text: You do not have enough permission to access this {{resource}}.
error.resource_not_found.text: This {{resource}} does not exist or has been deleted.
error.route_not_found.text: The server could not find the requested route.
error.server_error.text: A server error has been reported.
error.token_invalid_request_new: Token is invalid or expired. Please request a new one.
error.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Come back later or contact support.
error.try_again_later: Error has been reported. Please try again later or contact support.
error.unauthorized.text: You could not be authenticated by {{appName}}.
error.unauthorized_action: Unauthorized: No session or invalid session
error.unsubscribe_failed.text: Could not unsubscribe. Please try again later or contact support.
error.unsupported_oauth.text: This authentication provider is currently not supported. Please use another authentication method.
error.update_resource: {{resource}} could not be updated. Try again later.
error.waitlist_request_error: You can`t use the same email for both the newsletter and the waitlist. Please use a different email to join the waitlist.
experiment_notice.text: This site is online to experiment and discuss further development.
explain.invite_email.text: Type an email address and press ENTER. You can add multiple users.
explain.invite_search.text: Type a name and select the user. You can add multiple users.
explain.skip_org_creation.text: Create an organization in the main menu or ask a colleague to invite you, as you are not currently part of any organization.
global_search.text: Search for entities you belong to and users you share membership with in {{appName}}.
home.text: An overview of your activity on {{appName}}
in_waitlist: {{appName}} will soon contact you for early access!
invite_members.text: Invited members will receive an email to accept the invitation.
invite_members_search.text: Search for users to invite within {{appName}} who share a membership with you or are part of the same entity.
invite_only.text: {{appName}} is currently invite-only. Can't wait? Contact us for an invite.
invite_sign_in: Sign in to accept the invitation
invite_sign_in_or_up: Sign in or sign up to accept the invitation
invite_users.text: Invited users will receive an email to accept the invitation.
legal_notice.text: By signing up with {{ email }}, you agree to the
legal_notice_access_request.text: By requesting access, you agree to the
legal_text: Overview of all legal documents. To understand your rights and responsibilities when using {{appName}}.
local_db_inoperable: No local db. Try reloading or contact support
maintenance_mode.text: It appears the server is undergoing maintenance.
name: Name
newsletter.text: Create a newsletter and send it to specific users in the selected organizations.
notification_email.text: Receive announcements and product updates through this email address.
oauth.text: Connect your account with a popular identity provider.
offline.text_with_info: Connection lost. Limited functionality available. Data entered in forms will be saved.
offline_access.text: Enable offline access so you can safely work on your content when internet is down. Changes will be synced as you get back online!
offline_access_off.text: {{appName}} cleared offline cache and stopped syncing.
offline_access_on.text: {{appName}} keeps your content synced so you can work offline.
onboarding_completed.text: Have a look around and explore the features of {{appName}}.
onboarding_step2: Let's get started by creating your organization.
onboarding_step3: Invite one or more team members of {{appName}} to the previously created organization.
onboarding_welcome.text: This is a demo app to showcase the features of {{appName}}.
passkey.text: Sign in with fingerprint instead of password.
pending_invitations.text: Manage users invited to join this {{entity}}.
placeholder.subject: Type subject ...
refresh_pwa_app.text: New version available. Reload page for optimal use.
request_info.text: Interested in more info about {{appName}} and its roadmap? Leave your email and we will contact you.
request_message.text: Create a message and send it to pending users.
request_password.text: Reset your password by sending a reset link to your email address.
request_verification.text: We sent you an email. Please check your inbox and click on the link to verify your email address.
reset_password.text: Enter your email to receive a link to renew your password.
retry_reset_password.text: Wait 1 minute before sending another reset link.
sessions.text: Here you can view and terminate your active sessions. Terminating a session will sign you out from that device.
settings.text: Update your account settings and preferences
show_archived.offline.text: Offline access allows browsing only unarchived content during offline mode.
skip_org_creation.text: You are not part of an organization yet. To complete the onboarding process, please create one.
subject: Subject
success.reset_password_email: A reset email has been sent to {{email}}.
success.test.create_newsletter: Newsletter has been sent to self.
system_panel.text: System admins can manage and monitor all organizations and their members.
title: Title
under_construction.text: {{appName}} is a work in progress. We are building an issue/task tracker app with {{appName}}. Development of both {{appName}} and this app are happening in the same repo. The code will be split once {{appName}} is stable and ready for releases. Stable means {{appName}} has a stable API, automated tests and versioning. Contact us if you are interested in collaborating!
unsubscribe_text: We have updated your account settings so you will no longer receive newsletter at {{email}}. You can opt back in to receiving the newslettter by changing your settings anytime.
upload_img_max_10mb.text: Upload a PNG or JPG under 10MB
upload_multiple.text: Up to {{count}} {{item}} at a time. Max. 10MB each.
user_handle.text: A unique handle for your profile URL
waitlist_request.text: Get early access to {{appName}}. We will not send marketing mails.
